snippet.title: [Apple II] Wasteland (1988) (Interplay)
snippet.description:
Wasteland, for the Apple II, developed and published by Interplay.

An excellent blend of Ultima's exploration mode with a Wizardry-style combat mode [with hints of Ultima's]... in a post-apocalyptic setting. When Interplay was working on Fallout nearly a decade later, this is the game they were channeling.
